name: addNotifications
description:
Adds notifications to a notification scheme. You can add up to 1000 notifications per request.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

id.description: The ID of the notification scheme.

AddNotificationsDetails.description: Details of notifications which should be added to the notification scheme.

notificationSchemeEvents.description: The list of notifications which should be added to the notification scheme.

NotificationSchemeEventDetails.description: Details of a notification scheme event.

notifications.description: The list of notifications mapped to a specified event.

NotificationSchemeEventTypeId.description: The ID of an event that is being mapped to notifications.

id.description: The ID of the notification scheme event.

NotificationSchemeNotificationDetails.description: Details of a notification within a notification scheme.

parameter.description: The value corresponding to the specified notification type.
